{{flavour|The sinuous hide of a quicksilver dragon, covered in mercurial scales. In its raw form it does not provide much protection, but with magical means, it may be used to make excellent armour.}}

A '''quicksilver dragon hide''' can be obtained by butchering a [[quicksilver dragon]].

Using a [[scroll of enchant armour]] on it will create a [[quicksilver dragon armour]].

==History==
*Quicksilver dragon hides were removed in [[0.19]].
*Quicksilver dragon hides were added in [[0.16]].
